BlacklistCommand.label: Name of command
BlacklistCommand.tooltip: Specify the name of the name of the command.

BlacklistCost.label: Cost to use command
BlacklistCost.tooltip: Specify how many points it takes to use the command.

BlacklistDuration.label: Blacklist Duration in Seconds
BlacklistDuration.tooltip: Specify the number in seconds for how long a word should be blacklisted. 1 Minute = 60, 1 Hour = 3600, 1 Day = 86400

EnableRedeemMessage.label: Enable Redemption Message
EnableRedeemMessage.tooltip: Enable or disable redemption message notifying chat of redemption effect.

RedeemMessage.value: [username] has decreed that [word] shall not be used for [hours] hours!
RedeemMessage.label: Redemption Message
RedeemMessage.tooltip: Redemption message that will be posted notifying chat of redemption effect. options: [username] [word] [seconds] [minutes] [hours] [days]

EnableExpirationMessage.label: Enable Expiration Message
EnableExpirationMessage.tooltip: Enable or disable expiration message notifying chat of duration of reward effect ending.

ExpirationMessage.label: Expiration Message
ExpirationMessage.tooltip: Expiration message that will be posted notifying chat of duration of reward effect ending. options: [word]

EnableTriggerMessage.label: Enable Trigger Message
EnableTriggerMessage.tooltip: Enable or disable trigger message posted to chat after someone triggers the blacklist.

TriggerMessage.label: Trigger Message
TriggerMessage.tooltip: Trigger message that will be posted to chat after someone triggers the blacklist. options: [username] [msg]

CensorPhrase.label: Censor Phrase
CensorPhrase.tooltip: Message to replace blacklisted words in someone's message.
